Pozor, Arso izdal opozorilo pred močnimi nalivi
V torek bo oblačno in deževno, vmes bodo še možne nevihte, krajevno tudi dolgotrajnejši nalivi.
04 Nov 2019, 20:35 by N. Č.



FOTO: Jure Eržen, Delo



Oranžni alarm za polovico države. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek, Arso


LJUBLJANA – Ponoči bo na zahodu države začelo deževati, do jutra pa se bo po napovedi Arsa dež razširil precej proti vzhodu. Padavine se bodo proti jutru hitro krepile in zajele večji del Slovenije.


Oranžni alarm za polovico države. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek, Arso

Najnižje jutranje temperature bodo od 9 do 13, ob morju do 15 stopinj Celzija. V torek bo oblačno z občasnim dežjem, čez dan bodo možne nevihte, krajevno tudi dolgotrajnejši nalivi. Pihal bo južni do jugozahodni veter, ob morju predvsem dopoldne jugo. Zvečer bo dež večinoma ponehal. Najvišje dnevne temperature bodo od 11 do 17, na Primorskem do 20 stopinj.Zaradi obilnejših padavin bodo v torek zjutraj reke po Sloveniji začele naraščati in čez dan dosegle velike pretoke. Največje bodo dosegle v večernih urah in v noči na sredo. Ob tem lahko pride do razlivanj posameznih vodotokov. Gladina morja bo v torek ob jutranji plimi povišana.

Attention, Arso issued a warning against heavy rainfall
On Tuesday it will be cloudy and rainy, with possible thunderstorms and long-term rainfall.
04 Nov 2019, 20:35 by N. Č.



PHOTO: Jure Eržen, Delo



Orange alarm for half the country. PHOTO: Screenshot, Arso


LJUBLJANA - At night, it will start raining in the west of the country, and by morning, according to Ars, the rain will spread much to the east. Rainfall will increase rapidly in the morning and cover much of Slovenia.


Orange alarm for half the country. PHOTO: Screenshot, Arso

The lowest morning temperatures will be from 9 to 13, at sea to 15 degrees Celsius. On Tuesday it will be cloudy with occasional rain, during the day there will be possible thunderstorms and longer periods of rain. There will be a south to southwest wind, with the sea mostly south in the morning. In the evening, the rain will mostly go away. Highest daily temperatures will range from 11 to 17 in the Primorska region to 20 degrees. Due to heavy rainfall, rivers across Slovenia will start rising on Tuesday morning and reach high flows during the day. They will be maximized in the evening and Wednesday nights. This may result in spills of individual watercourses. The sea level will rise on Tuesday at high tide.
